api_data.job_title: Urgently Hiring for tour & Travel industry-Manager level

jd_information.description: Talent Hunters Hiring for Tours and Travel company : Position: Store Manager-FranchiseeVacancies : 1+1Locations: Mangalore, Tirupati, Gulbarga,BelgaumDepartment: Franchisee Job Requirements :Candidate Specification· Experience of selling products i.e. Group and FIT Packages (International & Domestic).· Knowledge about the company’s productsTotal Exp:-Minimum 1 to 5 yrs experience in Travel & Tourism·Education Qualification: Any GraduateShould be from Travel/Tourism industrySalary(CTC):Max4Lacs PA  hyderabad,                   Max:-3Lacs PA BangaloreNotice Period:Immediate joinees preferred,If interested you can send me your CV for this E-mail ID-thmumbai@yahoo.co.in/thms.recruiters@gmail.com OR you can call me on this Numbers -9867311024/9168920073. Regards, Pinky
